title: 98/404/EC: Commission Decision of 12 June 1998 introducing protective measures with regard to equidae imported from Turkey (notified under document number C(1998) 1593) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 June 1998 introducing protective measures with regard to equidae imported from Turkey (notified under document number C(1998) 1593) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/404/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall prohibit the temporary admission of registered horses from Turkey, their transit and the readmission of registered horses from Turkey after temporary export.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
